snippet.title: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 60: The Tokusatsu Henshin Hero (PS2 Gameplay)
snippet.description: This game is based on the Henshin Heroes television show and allows players to create their own hero, setting costume, secret skills, punches, and kicks freely. The game features a story mode based on all twelve episodes of the television series, with players working their way through 3D levels and taking out enemies. At the end of a level, a giant beast awaits. Earn new parts for your original hero by performing well in the stages.
